title: Because it's just me
creator_credit: WNVT Northern Virginia, Jan E Skrentry and Richard Even
brief_description: Encourages students to examine their own talents., abilities, likes and dislikes and visualise how these might influence their future career choices, opportunities and leisure activities. Suitable for Mid-Upper Secondary level students.
